mapper.insert: INSERT INTO linker.project(title, u_id, t_id, ps_id) VALUES(#{title}, #{u_id}, #{t_id}, #{ps_id});
mapper.select: SELECT project.id, title, u_id, project.cdate, t_id, ps_id, email AS writerEmail, nickname AS writerNickname FROM linker.project JOIN linker.user ON user.id = project.u_id WHERE project.t_id = #{teamID} AND project.ps_id IN (1, 2) ORDER BY project.cdate DESC LIMIT 0, 10;
